title: Report from “the Oslo Conference on Safe Schools. Protecting Education from Attack” (Ministry of Education ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of Education and Research of the Kingdom of Norway ) The Oslo Conference on Safe Schools: Protecting Education from Attack , was organised in Oslo 28-29 May 2015 . By October 2015 , 49 states had endorsed the Safe Schools
